Arik Airlines

It was founded in 2002 and is the leading airline in West Africa, offering domestic, regional, and international flights.

Arik operates primarily from two hubs: the flagship office at Murtala Muhammed International Airport in Lagos and another office at Nnamdi Azikiwe International Airport in Abuja, where it oversees flight services to and from various African destinations.

Arik Airline Destinations

Arik Airline travel destinations include domestic and international destinations. In operations, Arik Air travels to over 15 domestic destinations and 11 international destinations. Below is the list of Arik Air Travel destinations across the 26 destinations in Africa.

Steps for Arik Air Booking Online

To conveniently book for Arik Airline ticket online, follow the steps below;

  • Visit the Arik Air website: https://www.arikair.com
  • Click on the “book flight tickets”.
  • Select “one way”, or “round trip”.
  • Select the location: “flying from”.
  • Then, select the destination: “flying to”.
  • Select “Departure Date”.
  • Select the number of Adults, Children, and Infants expected to board flight.
  • Next, click “flight search”.

Payment Currencies Accepted by Arik Air Booking Online

Arik Air has the right to accept payment in any currency. Some of the monetary alternatives available online include: US dollars, Ghanaian cedes, Nigerian Naira, the Euro, British pounds, and other currencies are accepted.

Taxes, currency fares, and charges are paid in the currency of the country issuing the ticket unless otherwise specified by Arik Air or its authorized agent at or before the time of payment.

Can I Board a Flight without an e-Ticket?

No customer will be able to board a flight unless they provide an authentic form of identification and a valid e-ticket receipt that is duly issued in their name.

What Can I do if my e-Ticket is Lost?

In case a customer loses their ticket and requests a replacement, a new ticket will be issued, provided there is evidence. Charges may be incurred for this service.

Can I Change the Place of Departure?

It is possible to change the place of departure. However, such changes may incur extra charges too.

For customers who do not show up for a flight without a notice that is at least one day in advance of time for departure, Arik Air may decide to cancel the reservations made for such customers’ return.
